price: او قرآن مو بېل بېل كړ چې وخت پر وخت يې په خلكو ولولې او هغه مو كرار كرار نازل كړ.
arabic: وَقُرۡءَانٗا فَرَقۡنَٰهُ لِتَقۡرَأَهُۥ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ عَلَىٰ مُكۡثٖ وَنَزَّلۡنَٰهُ تَنزِيلٗا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: waqur'ānan faraqnāhu litaqra-ahu ʿalā al-nāsi ʿalā muk'thin wanazzalnāhu tanzīlan
